content:
Promo Summary/Background:
The candidate is being considered for promotion due to their exceptional performance and contributions to the IT department. They have consistently demonstrated strong technical skills and the ability to effectively communicate and collaborate with both the team and customers.

Communication & Influence:
The employee has a proven track record of effectively communicating and resolving IT service issues and desktop support. They are able to clearly and professionally communicate with customers and team members to understand and resolve their IT issues. They have also shown ability to influence their team and customers through their communication skills and IT knowledge.

Innovation & Complexity:
The employee is known for their ability to think outside of the box and come up with innovative solutions to highly complex IT issues. They have a broad knowledge base and are able to leverage collaboration tools to exceed customer expectations. They have consistently demonstrated the ability to find solutions to complex problems that other team members were unable to solve.

Organizational Impact:
The employee has consistently demonstrated high organizational impact by working smart and hard to support the team and customers. They have also consistently supported other functional teams, and have made a wide impact across several IT teams and overall in support of the business needs. They are known for their dedication, work ethic and for being a valuable asset to the organization.

Overall, this candidate has a proven track record of exceptional performance and has consistently demonstrated the skills and qualities required for a successful promotion. They are highly qualified and would be an asset to the organization in a higher role.
